title: Remodeled 1 Bedroom ** FIRST SHOWING SUNDAY **
posting_body: ['3408 Richmond Blvd.', 'Oakland, CA 94611', 'Offered by Bay Apartment Advisors', 'Please text/phone Tanya', 'show contact info', 'to schedule a showing', '** Photos of similar unit**', "This very spacious unit one-bedroom unit is situated close to several of Oakland's best neighborhoods.", "Located in a quiet neighborhood, it is only blocks away from Uptown, Grand Ave, Adam's Point, and Piedmont Ave.", 'With a Walk Score of 89, you are just a short trip away from Whole Foods, Sprouts, CVS, Piedmont Ave, Broadway Liquors, First Friday celebrations, and Broadway.', 'There is also convenient access to several of the East Bay’s major freeways, this apartment makes a great home for commuters and walkers alike.', 'Check out the photos!', '**Please read entire ad before emailing questions.', '**', 'KEY FEATURES', '•Bedrooms: 1 Bed', '•Bathrooms: 1 Bath', '•Sq.', 'Footage: 650 +/-', '•Floor: 3rd', '•Parking: Street', '•Laundry: On-site', 'PROPERTY HIGHLIGHTS', '- Walking distance to Broadway, Sprout’s Market, Starbucks, Chipotle, and Whole Foods.', '- Quiet, 1920’s complex.', '- Quick access to 580, 80, 880, 24, and 13 Freeways.', '- Highly desirable location, close to Piedmont Avenue, Uptown, Adam’s Point.', '- Elevator', 'LEASE TERMS', '•Rent:$2,095.00', '•Deposit: $2,095.00', '•Lease Duration: 1-year', '•Pets: Cats Ok', '•Utilities Water, Sewer, Garbage Included', '•Available:', 'Now', 'Rental listings subject to change at any time.', '(Broker) believes all information contained herein to be correct but assumes no legal responsibility for the accuracy, any errors, or any omissions in this ad or any syndicated ads on third party websites.', 'Square footage is an estimate only, not an exact measurement.', 'Apply online at: <URL>']
